posts.title: My First Post
posts.body: I did this and that and that. What an mazing day it was indeed.

posts.title: My Second Post
posts.body: My week was good but there was this one crazy scenario that happened.

posts.title: My Third Post
posts.body: Nature; the birds, the seals, the waves, the breeze all made the day so beautiful.

posts.title: My Fourth Post
posts.body: Clothes are an extension to who you are. They describe you to the brim.
